name: TopSpot Internet Marketing
tagline: We're Your Partner Through It All
description:
TopSpot Internet Marketing is a comprehensive web design, development and search engine marketing firm based in Houston, Texas.
We specialize in providing B2B and industrial manufacturers, distributors and service providers with comprehensive online marketing solutions. 
Started in 2003 with five original team members, TopSpot has been one of the fastest growing search marketing firms in Houston, Texas. With over 100 employees based in our home office and 20 sales representatives around the country, TopSpot's current customer base exceeds 850.
From day one, our practices have centered on addressing some of the biggest issues in our industry (transparency, accountability, consistency and delivering results) and how we could correct them. This focus has sculpted our teams, our process, our reporting and our relationships with our clients, allowing us to maintain one of the highest retention rates in the industry.
